About Deligence

We develop Custom Mobile Apps, Web Apps, and we implement & customize Zoho CRM and Salesforce CRM for our clients. We are Salesforce Consulting Partners and Zoho Authorized Partner. Bring us your intended results, and we will provide the tools to easily and effectively make them happen.

Yes, Artificial Intelligence has been a very impressive partner, and we have harnessed it to provide safe, cloud-based ongoing innovation and increased expansion, effectiveness, and resilience.

Our Best Target Audience:
Businesses wishing to offer more comprehensive communication for their sales forces and customers.

Our Success Stories

Factile is a no-cost educational platform that enables teachers to generate captivating Jeopardy-style quiz games for both online and offline classrooms. Factile is built on React, and its main motive is to make it easy to engage students in studying by involving gamification. We have built this project from scratch and are currently managing it as well. We have successfully scaled it to 2M+ users.

Meditation4Soul, is a dynamic Flutter meditation app available for iOS and Android. With a feature-rich admin panel, it can be customized to individuals, yoga trainers, and businesses owners. Meditation4Soul offers guided meditations, customizable features, and seamless yoga integration for a personalized wellness journey. It redefines the meditation experience, gives us inner peace and mental balance.

View All Our Success Stories
